senselogic.sitevision.api.search.searcher.builder

Interface PermissionCheckBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Builder<PermissionCheck>

    @Requireable(value="PermissionCheckBuilder")
public interface PermissionCheckBuilder
extends Builder<PermissionCheck>

    Builder for creating a PermissionCheck component.

    PermissionCheck has one optional attribute:

    • permission strategy - the permission checking strategy. Default is PermissionStrategy.EARLY_CHECK.

    Tip! The Builder interface documentation contains more information about Builders and how to work with them!

    An instance of the Sitevision class implementing this interface can be obtained via SearchFactory.getPermissionCheckBuilder(). See SearchFactory for how to obtain an instance of the SearchFactory interface.

    Since:
    Sitevision 2023.09.1
    Author:
    Magnus LÃ¶vgren

    • Method Detail

      • setPermissionStrategy

        PermissionCheckBuilder setPermissionStrategy(PermissionStrategy aPermissionStrategy)
        Sets the permission strategy.

        aPermissionStrategy - the permission strategy
        Returns:
        this builder

      • build

        PermissionCheck build()
        Creates a PermissionCheck component instance using currently specified state/behaviour.

        Default strategy PermissionStrategy.EARLY_CHECK will be used if the component has no state (i.e. no PermissionStrategy explicitly set) when built.

        Specified by:
        build in interface Builder<PermissionCheck>
        Returns:
        a permission check component

Sitevision - Portal and Content Management Made Easy
Sitevision is an advanced Java enterprise portal product and a portlet container (JSR 286) that implements Java Content Repository (JSR 283).
